title: Welcome!

paraText: Welcome to this Leviton Human Resources “Compliance Training for a Harassment-Free Workplace”
This course is required to be completed by all Leviton employees
We will cover the following things in this topic:
list: Ut convallis turpis nibh, sit amet facilisis orci vulput
Nulla maximus vulputate orci id lacinia
Sed pellentesque diam ut augue interdum
Cras tortor dolor, fermentum eu nibh vitae, euismod
Nam varius consectetur augue, eu suscipit tellus

transcriptText: Welcome to Leviton’s “Compliance Training for a Harassment-Free Workplace.”</br></br>This course is required to be completed by all Leviton employees.

ccText.text: Hello, and welcome to the Privacy Overview module.
When it comes to patient information it is especially important that we understand the regulations and guidelines so we can protect patient privacy.
Explain the need for standardization in the secure chip industry.
Describe how GlobalPlatform provides solutions to facilitate secure chip acceptance.
Build a root of trust using a GlobalPlatform device.
Choose the best management model according to your ecosystem.
